snippet.title: Worms™ Reloaded - Trailer 3 - for PC from Steam, released 26th August 2010
snippet.description:
Buy now for PC from Steam: http://bit.ly/WRelSteam

Ten years on from Worms™ Armageddon and the turn-based comic mayhem continues in Worms™ Reloaded, an all-new edition available for PC through Steam. The game is packed with customization options, and includes thousands of possibilities for your team of worms, tons of game options and custom levels, so you can play the game how you want!

Team17, founded in 1990, are a fully independent video game developer and publisher responsible for the Worms™ series, Alien Breed and Superfrog. Ensure you never miss out on our latest videos by subscribing to us now: http://bit.ly/SubscribeT17.

Don't forget you can also
Like us on Facebook: http://bit.ly/LikeWorms
Follow us on Twitter: http://bit.ly/FollowT17
